name: Taskade
long_description:
Meet your AI-powered team with Taskade! Build, train, and deploy AI agents that think, learn, and act—ready to plan, research, and complete tasks alongside you.

Unlock powerful workflows where humans and AI work together to boost productivity. Automate tasks, streamline projects, and turn insights into action—all in one seamless workspace.

Experience the future of work with Taskade, where AI and human collaboration supercharge your team's potential. 🌐 🐑
one_liner: Build Your AI Agent Workforce — AI-Powered Productivity & Automation
